title: News
author: unknown
text: We use Google Analytics cookies to collect information about the use of the Orgalim website. Google Analytics analyses your interaction with the Orgalim website and stores information about your operating system, web browser, pages visited, demographics of the users, the device used, and where the visit originated. To disable Google Analytics cookies in your browser, follow these steps: Go to your browserâ€™s settings or preferences. Navigate to the Privacy or Cookies section. Look for an option to block third-party cookies or manage Google Analytics cookies. Alternatively, you can use the Google Analytics Opt-Out Browser Add-On to prevent Google Analytics from tracking your activity. For more information on the performance cookies, visit the cookie policy Please enable Strictly Necessary Cookies first so that we can save your preferences!
